description: Created RQT plugins for GPS conversion using C++
Led and managed fundraising projects for the Wilson tech club, including running a video game tournament. Led a team developing a game using Unity and C#.
Designed, built and maintained the Wilson STEM club website. Collaborated with other executives to run competitions and other facets of the club.
Helped organize kids, set up and run drills, games, tournaments and warm ups.
Assisted children aged 5 to 12 in literacy skills including reading and speaking.
